夜已深，左右无人，四下无声。
48号机还闪着幽冷的蓝光。Kid按下了打火机。
——咔嚓——咔嚓——嘶——
烟雾缭绕，模糊了他的视线。。。。。。

篝火边的德怀特毫不避讳地扣着鼻子，然后以一个刁钻的角度把鼻屎弹进火焰里，假装什么也没发生过。克劳黛特黝黑的脸上露出了意味深长的微笑，显然她注意到了德怀特的举动，但她没有必要说出来，毕竟让两个人都尴尬也没什么意思。

“逃出来了，ez~” 好像注意到了克劳黛特的表情，德怀特没话找话“也不知道下一个屠夫是什么，到底逃走多少次才算完。我倒想看看这一切是谁——”

“嘘！” 克劳黛特脸色有点不对“你不想活了？明知故问，是那个连名字都不能提的人！”

德怀特无奈地撇了撇嘴“真的么，克劳德，我们已经逃这么多次了，你还是不敢直呼他的名字。 你就不能说出来么？Enti——”

“闭嘴，当心下次他就给你安排了！”

“Oh， entity， entity， entity！”

“你怎么敢。。。。。。” 克劳黛特瞪大了眼睛。

“亏你还是个植物学家，Entity只是个称呼罢了。”德怀特半认真半调侃。

“可是我们见过它，一团没有形状的黑雾，时而出现，时而消失。 这一切你又怎么解释？”

“ 如果他只是这个世界之外的一种存在呢？”

短暂的沉默。篝火发出噼啪的相声，火光映在两个人的脸上。

“什么意思？”

德怀特挠了挠头，接着说“有没有一种可能， 我们眼前的世界并不是它的全部。 而在某个更高的维度，另一种人——或者entity，在监视着我们。”

“说下去。” 

德怀特弯下腰，左右手捡起了两片树叶“ 我们就像在这片树叶上面，而每次从迷雾中醒来就像被从这片树叶放到这片上。”

“而。。。。。。entity。。。。。。” 克劳黛特喃喃自语道“ entity 就是能打通两片叶子的人。这也能解释为什么每次出现都是没有形状的黑影。。。。。。可是这么多的叶子。。。。。。“

一阵沉默。 

火苗噼啪作响，尽力蹿升，又回到原来的高度，像是一次次无谓的抵抗。 在无边的黑夜的映衬下，这一点红色显得虚幻而渺小。孤独与疏离感弥漫开来，空气凝固了。

“可即便是这样又能怎样呢。” 克劳黛特默默流下了眼泪。“我们迷失在这个鬼地方，每天都被追杀。谁知道我们明天会在哪？”

又一阵沉默。

德怀特仰头看着没有星星的天空说：“你知道吗，我一直坚信，只要我们不放弃，总有一天，我们能从迷雾里走出去，也许不是明天，但那一天一定会来。”

“还记得我遇见你的那一天吗？”德怀特拍了拍克劳黛特的肩膀，接着说“那是我刚来到这里的第一天，我浑身发抖地躲在柜子里。当时柜子上已经落满乌鸦了，是你把医疗箱放在柜子边上，然后翻窗引开了屠夫。 从那时起，我就知道，你会成为我逃生的好伙伴。现在我们一起逃走这么多次了，总有一天，我们会彻底离开这个鬼地方。你放心，有我罩着你！”

“其实。。。。。。”克劳黛特有点尴尬“ 那天我刚摸出来一个医疗箱，听到屠夫心跳，就想把刚摸出来的医疗箱藏起来，没想到被你拿走了。。。。。。”

“呃。。。好吧。。。” 德怀特说“ 那，还有一次，你用地图标记大门让所有人成功逃走那回呢？屠夫都气炸了。”

“那回我是想自己走地窖。。。” 克劳黛特笑着说。

“呃。。。还有一次，你遛了好久屠夫，给大家争取了时间。”

“那次我用手电晃了他， 狗日的一直追我，我也没办法，哈哈哈。”

“好吧。。。至少你还算诚实。”

“呐，我这么诚实，你还不把我的医疗箱还给我？”

“那可不行，谁捡到就是谁的。”

“那我用手电跟你换行吧？”

“好吧，我只要双电池的紫手电。”

“你耍臭无赖！”

“嘿嘿，没错！”

。。。。。。

Kid回过神，电脑右下角显示是3：53分，但窗外一片漆黑。

Kid从来没有仔细地观察过夜晚，尤其是这样没有星星的夜。黑暗从四面八方弥漫过来，这个房间好像是黑暗中温暖的避难所。 Kid再一次环视这个充满记忆的空间，又看了看窗外。

“是时候了。” Kid自言自语道。

他把烟熄了，穿上大衣，推开门，消失在黑暗里。

房间里，48号桌上，烟头上红光挣扎着， 仿佛在说有一个人曾经来过，但最终离开了。

黎明总要来的。 烟也总要灭。

黎明光顾了冷风农场，克劳黛特和德怀特躲进了无边的玉米地，新的危险在等着他们，不过他们已经想好了对策。

黎明将至，清冷的街道上出现了零零散散的早起的人。太阳要升起来了，新的一天要来了。。。。。。
玩鬼被溜破頭，玩人被一掛面守斬，真香

so this is the second time since the games release that ive played it and its still good. unfortunately theyre obviously still having balance issues. new killers can literally facecamp and win. you just cant push out gens fast enough to counter even a bad killer. they arent penalized for camping instead it seems to be encouraged, which is another thing theyve been dealing with for a while. balance would be good. i like good killers but god the bad ones can just sit there and wrack up points while your first hook becomes your last.

Minecraft has better graphical optimization than this piece of shit.
Game crashes every 10 minutes, and beyond the screen tearing it is nearly impossible to play let alone see shit. 
Developers have yet to address this stupid ass optimization. I'd rather watch a dog shit on a stick than try to fix this.

The game is great... when it's working. However, it crashes DAILY and then bans you because you have to force quit and close it. It's not our fault that there are errors so why are you penalizing the players for that? Also, you better have a decent Internet connection because if it goes out during a match, you're getting banned for that too.

EDIT: devs seem to have fixed a good bit of issues. The game still crashes every now and then but not nearly as much as before and they haven't banned me on crashes anymore.
Juego lleno de errores, golpes falsos, desconexiones aleatorias y los desarrolladores solo sacan skins, y no mejoran realmente el juego.

I've had the game almost since the release. The devs are always trying to cater to the community and constantly attempt to improve the game and fix anything that may be off balance.  Of all the games I have played the devs are honestly the most attentive and dedicated that I have come across, and for that I thank them. The community isn't as great as it used to be unfortunately, which can effect gameplay, however all in all the game is amazing and well looked after even after almost 4 years. I would highly suggest purchasing this game to anyone I know .

I hope dead by daylight adds cross-progression. As someone who not only has prestige 3 survivors, killers, and event cosmetics on their Xbox account, it's sad to see that Behavior hasn't done cross-progression. They announced cross-progression 1 year ago today, and still, the only thing you can do is link Switch and steam with stadia. The game is great with lots of potential, and after seeing the game go from a fun mess to being filled with cheaters it's disappointing. The devs need to put in care as this game can genuinely become super great if it's executed correctly. Overall, fun and toxic, better with friends.

I am not a fan of horror games. Never have and never will be. I initially let the horror aspect of this game scare me off until my brother told me to give it a try, as it is just "hide and seek with skill and mind games." That was back in september. Two months later I have 30 hours in the game and will have much more. The game is just very fun to play (minus the occasional toxic build) and will get you thinking about predicting movements from both the killer and survivor side. The asymmetrical gameplay keeps the game fresh by allowing players who are tired of playing killer swap over to survivor and have an entirely different objective.
Combine that with the comical horror movie tropes of everything taking too long, the killer has an aura of terror and cheesy music when they approach that lets survivors know the approach long before the killer gets there, the killer moving faster than survivors, and the tasks being comically loud, and you have an amazingly fun game that struggles to have boring or tedious gameplay.

I have played this game on a little bit of pc but more on xbox. I love this game. I play it every day. There's still a lot of stuff they need to improve, they're getting there. I would say that I recommend this game for people who like playing with a team, and also solo. It's 5 players altogether. There's 4 survivors and 1 killer. You can play as survivor or as killer but it's all online unless you do a custom game. It's versatile and unique. It is not scary (but i don't get scared easily) but, there are times where I've accidentally gotten jump scared by the killers. There's a couple silent killers who can pop up on you. This game is very easy to navigate and super fun to play with friends or without.
